com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Forward
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Navigate forward to the next page in the browser history.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Bookmark
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Add the current webpage to your bookmarks for easy access later.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Download
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Initiate a download of the content currently being viewed.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Page Info
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: View detailed information about the current webpage.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: New Tab
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Open a new browsing tab to start a fresh session.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Open History
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: View the browsing history to find previously visited pages.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Delete Browsing Data
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Remove saved browsing data such as history, cache, and cookies.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Downloads
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Access and manage all downloaded files within the browser.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Bookmarks
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: View and manage all saved bookmarks for easy access to favorite sites.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Recent Tabs
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Access a list of tabs recently closed or synced from other devices.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Share
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Share the current webpage with others through various communication channels.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Find in Page
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Search for specific text within the current webpage.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Translate
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Translate the current webpage to another language.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Listen to This Page
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Use text-to-speech to listen to the content of the current page.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Add to Home Screen
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Create a shortcut to the current webpage on your device's home screen.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Get Image Descriptions
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Retrieve and view descriptions for images on the current page, useful for accessibility.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Search or Enter URL/link
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Use the URL bar to enter a search query or type a URL/link to navigate to a specific website.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Start voice search
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Initiate a voice-based search using the microphone button.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Search with camera
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Use Google Lens to search using the camera for images or objects.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Share Discover content
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Share specific articles from the Discover section using the share button.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Switch or close tabs
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Use the tab switcher button to manage open tabs or close them.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Signed-in account settings
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Open settings related to the signed-in Google account.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Open Home Page
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Navigates to the home page of the browser, typically a predefined page set as the home by the user or the browser.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Customize and Control Chrome
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Opens the menu to allow the user to customize and control various aspects of Google Chrome, like settings, extensions, history, etc.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Subscription
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: View and manage the subscriptions list to see content from subscribed channels.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Profile
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Access the user's profile section for account settings and personalizations.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Forget Password
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Initiate the process to recover your password if you've forgotten it

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Create New Account
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Start the process to create a new Facebook account

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Secure Connection Status
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: View the security status icon indicating the connection is secure

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: View Edit History
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Access the edit history of the current Wikipedia page to see past revisions.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Open Language Options
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Use the language button to select different languages for viewing Wikipedia.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Edit Bookmark
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Edit or manage your bookmarks for quick access to preferred articles or sections.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Privacy Policy
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Provides access to the privacy policy details for the user to review.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Submit Price Request
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Allows the user to submit a request to obtain the price of the domain within 24 hours.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Privacy Settings
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Enables the user to adjust privacy settings according to their preferences.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: View Filter Options
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Click on the filter options to refine search results based on specific criteria.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Select Filter
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Click on any filter category like 'Video', 'Shopping', 'News', etc., to refine results.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: View Detailed Information
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Click the button to view more information about a specific search result.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: View External Link
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Click on an external link to open the referenced webpage, e.g., GitHub or CSDN blog.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Open Search Tools
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Click the search tools button to access advanced search options.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Update Location
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Click the update location button to refresh or update your current location.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Show Experimental Features
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Click on experimental feature options or tools to explore additional functionalities.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Enable Notifications
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Click the button to allow notifications for updates related to your search.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: View News Item
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: View a specific news item, such as 'Evidence of ‘Negative Time’ Found in Quantum Physics Experiment' or 'Google’s New Gmail App Password Rules—You Have 24 Hours To Comply'.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Refresh
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Reload the current webpage to refresh its content.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: History
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Access the browsing history to view previously visited web pages.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Delete browsing data
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Clear the browsing data, including history, cache, and cookies.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Recent tabs
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Access recently closed tabs and reopen them if needed.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Open Preferences
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Opens a menu to adjust settings and preferences for the application or page.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Download link
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Initiates the download of the content from the link, saving it to the user's device.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.name: Remove
com.google.android.apps.chrome.Main.description: Allows the user to remove or delete the selected item from the current view or list.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Open Lens View
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Access the Lens view container to use the Google Lens functionalities.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: View Promo Banner
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Check any promotional banners available in the promo banner container.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Interact with Lens Content
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Engage with the content available in the Lens content area, possibly images or text to analyze.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Manage Lens Settings
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Adjust lens-related settings within the coordinator container.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Display Lens Error Message
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: View any error messages when Lens encounters issues, shown in the error message container.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Access Action Menu
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Open the action menu which might contain additional options or settings.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Use Magnifier
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Activate the magnifier container for a closer view of elements on-screen.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Use Camera
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Capture images or videos through the camera fragment container for processing with Google Lens.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Open Lens Gallery
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: View and select images from the Lens gallery to analyze or search.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Toggle Filter Options
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Switch between various filter settings for specific Lens modes.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Select Image from Gallery
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Choose an image from the gallery using the picker button for Lens analysis.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Use Shutter Button
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Capture a new image using the shutter button view for immediate analysis.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Navigate Overlay Buttons
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Utilize overlay buttons for actions such as closing, going back, or accessing more options.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Search with Camera
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Enable the feature to search for objects using the phone's camera directly within the app.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Translate Text
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Use Lens to translate text from an image in the Translate mode of filters.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Review Search History
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Access past searches performed with Lens in the history button container.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Adjust Flash
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Toggle the flash settings for better visibility in low light conditions when using the camera.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Engage with Google Lens Features
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Further interact with the features, like recognizing objects or extracting text, provided by Google Lens.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Manage Overlays
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Handle multiple overlays that might present additional information or settings on top of the visual interface.

com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.name: Explore Other Options
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit.description: Utilize the overflow menu to explore more options or settings within the app.

com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.name: Search
com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.description: Initiate a search query via a text input or voice command.

com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.name: Microphone
com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.description: Activate or deactivate the microphone for voice search or transcription.

com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.name: Stop Listening
com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.description: Stop the ongoing voice transcription or listening activity.

com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.name: Transcription Display
com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.description: View the transcription of the voice input or search query.

com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.name: Change Language
com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.description: Change the language settings for the transcription or voice search.

com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.name: Google Logo
com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.description: Tap the Google logo to reset or clear the search input.

com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.name: Sound Levels
com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.description: Adjust or monitor sound levels during the voice search or transcription.

com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.name: Visual Mic Indicator
com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.description: View the microphone's visual status or indicator during the transcription or voice search process.

com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.name: Voice Recognizer
com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.description: Activate the voice recognizer to process and convert spoken words into text.

com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.name: Intent API
com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.description: Interact with the backend API for processing voice search intents or commands.

com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.name: Text Input
com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.description: Enter or modify text for search purposes in the search box.

com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.name: Search Result Display
com.google.android.libraries.speech.tran.description: View the results or suggestions from a voice or text search.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Click on the 'Toolbar shortcut' option to customize the shortcut options available on the toolbar.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Click on the 'Accessibility' option to adjust settings for users with disabilities or special needs.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Open the Help & Feedback section by clicking the 'Help & Feedback' button (ID: 6).

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: View the Privacy and Security options like 'Delete browsing data', 'Privacy Guide', 'Third-party cookies', etc.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Delete Browsing Data
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Access the option to delete browsing history, cookies, site data, and cache under 'Delete browsing data' (ID: 11).

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Review key privacy and security controls by selecting the 'Privacy Guide' (ID: 13).

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Adjust settings related to third-party cookies under the 'Third-party cookies' section (ID: 15).

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Manage ad privacy settings, including customizing the information used by sites to show ads (ID: 17).

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Toggle the 'Do Not Track' request option under 'Send a “Do Not Track” request' (ID: 19).

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Adjust preloading options under 'Preload pages' (ID: 21) to set the desired preloading behavior.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Enable or disable the option to lock Incognito tabs when leaving Chrome under 'Lock Incognito tabs when you leave Chrome' (ID: 23).

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Enable or disable the Safe Browsing feature for enhanced protection under the 'Safe Browsing' section (ID: 28).

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Access and interact with the navigation bar background (ID: 30), typically used for navigating between app sections.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Toggle Settings Switch
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Toggle the settings switch for specific options in the menu (ID: 26), typically for enabling or disabling a feature.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: View Content
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Interact with the main content area that displays options like 'Privacy', 'Security', 'Ad privacy', etc. (ID: 7, ID: 9).

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: View Additional Privacy Options
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: View other privacy-related options such as 'Privacy Guide', 'Third-party cookies', and 'Send a Do Not Track request' (IDs 14, 16, 18).

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Use the 'Navigate up' button to go back to the previous screen or to a higher-level menu in the Chrome settings.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Manage preloading pages setting to enable or disable standard preloading options for quicker browsing.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Enable or disable the option to lock incognito tabs when you leave Chrome, requiring screen lock to access them again.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Toggle Safe Browsing
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Change safe browsing settings to adjust protection levels against harmful content while browsing.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Toggle Secure Connections
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Control the setting that prioritizes the use of secure connections (HTTPS) and warns you about sites that do not support it.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Toggle Secure DNS
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Adjust the setting for using a secure DNS, which is set to automatic by default for enhanced security.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Toggle Phone as Security Key
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Enable or disable the use of your phone as a security key for controlling which devices can sign in with your credentials.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Toggle Access Payment Methods
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Allow or restrict sites from being able to check if you have payment methods saved in your Chrome profile.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Navigate Up
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Navigate back to the previous screen using the 'Navigate up' button.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Help & Feedback
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Open the 'Help & feedback' section by clicking the Help button.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Theme Option
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Open the theme settings by clicking the 'Theme' text element.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: System Default Theme
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Select the 'System default' option, which turns on dark theme when your device's dark theme or Battery Saver is active.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Light Theme
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Select the 'Light' theme option to use the light theme.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Dark Theme
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Select the 'Dark' theme option to use the dark theme.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: List Container
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: View and interact with the list container that holds theme-related options and settings.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Recycler View
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Interact with the recycler view that displays a list of items, potentially for selecting a theme or other options.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Radio Button (System Default)
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Click the radio button next to the 'System default' theme option.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Radio Button (Light)
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Click the radio button next to the 'Light' theme option.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Theme Description
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: View the description text for the selected theme, explaining its function, such as the behavior of the dark theme with Battery Saver.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Navigation Bar
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Interact with or view the navigation bar background at the bottom of the screen.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Navigate Up
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Press the 'Navigate up' button to go back to the previous screen.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Open Settings
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Access the settings menu to view and change various configuration options related to your Google account and Chrome.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Help & Feedback
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Press the 'Help & feedback' button to access assistance or provide feedback about the app.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: View Account Info
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: View information related to your Google account, such as account name and email address.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Manage Sync
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: View and modify synchronization settings. Currently, sync is turned on.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: View Google Services
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: View options related to various Google services associated with your account.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Change Search Engine
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: View and, if applicable, change the default search engine.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Access Password Manager
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Access Google Password Manager to manage your saved passwords.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Manage Payment Methods
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: View and manage your saved payment methods in Google account.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Manage Addresses
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: View and manage your saved addresses and possibly other information.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Privacy and Security Settings
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Access options to manage your privacy and security settings.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Perform Safety Check
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: Access and perform a safety check to ensure your account is secure.

org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.name: Manage Notifications
org.chromium.chrome.browser.settings.Set.description: View and manage notification settings for your account and applications.
